= Various substitution examples

and are our widget-wranglers.

offers a fascinating alternate view on privacy issues.

offers a fascinating alternate view on privacy issues.

4XSLT has the convenience method , so you don't have to mess with DOM objects
if all you want is the transformed output.

West led the {{/images/heart.png}} 3, covered by dummy's {{/images/heart.png}}
Q, East's {{/images/heart.png}} K, and trumped in hand with the
{{/images/spade.png}} 2.

* {{red_light.png}} means stop.

* {{green_light.png}} means go.

* {{yellow_light.png}} means go really fast.

{{discord.png}} is the official symbol of [[http://www.poee.org/|POEE]].

is a little annoying to type over and over, especially when writing about
itself, and spelling out the bicapitalized word every time isn't really
necessary for source readability.

But still, that's nothing compared to a name like __.
